name: Ice Body
summary: If the weather is Hail, the user has 1/16 of their HP restored.
viability: For Defensive and Specially Defensive walls like Walrein, Ice Body is fantastic. Combine that with Leftovers, and you gain 1/8 of your max HP each turn. The unfortunate thing is that weather isn't permanent anymore, so you would only get that restored HP for a certain amount of turns. It's still good when operating under a Hail team, though.
